title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The current issue is that when using ajc outjar, the resulting file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file, even though there is a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside.
OB: When using ajc outjar, the resulting file is created with a .jar extension, but it does not include a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: If outjar is used, the resulting file should be a valid jar file that includes a MANIFEST.MF file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Call ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar
2. Check the output file. It will have a .jar extension, but it will not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
